disksize.description: The size of the disk image in Megabytes. If not given: default to be calculated.

diskguid.description: The disk GUID. If not given/full of zeros: default to be calculated.

align.description: The partition alignment in Kilobytes. Zero gives sector alignment.

config.description: The path to the config file.

iso9660.description: Whether to generate ISO9660 Boot Catalog into the image. Defaults to false

gzip.description: Whether to gzip the initrd. Defaults to true.

directory.description: The path to the directory whose contents will be used to generated the initrd. Can be an array for multiarch images.

file.description: The name of the image file to be used. Can be an array for multiarch images.

size.description: The size of the partition in Megabytes. Defaults to be calculated.

file.description: The name of the partition file to be used.

directory.description: The path to the directory whose contents will be used to generated the partition.

driver.description: The driver to be used for the partition. Optional, made for cases type can't specify the format without a doubt.

name.description: UTF-8 partion name, limited to code points 32 to 65535 (BMP)
